about_the_game:
Set in the year 2073 in a post apocalyptic Lagos Nigeria, West Africa. Humanity is on the verge of extinction. The earth has fallen into ruin under the threat of an invasive alien species known as the Altrius. Play as Chimere Uzoma, a fierce and genetically enhanced human soldier called an "Enforcer", who must protect one of the last enclaves of humanity called "Azure". The Enforcers are created for one purpose: to turn the tide in the war against the Altrius. Dive into a narrative-rich campaign where the survival of humanity hangs in the balance, enhanced by intricate voice acting and a hip-hop/afro-beat infused soundtrack.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Combat System: Master an expansive combo system with interlinking moves across a variety of weapons. From melee swords and spears to projectile-based secondary arms, tailor your assault style to decimate the alien foes.

  • Rich Narrative and World: Explore the remnants of a futuristic Lagos, uncovering the dark plans of the Altrius that could spell doom for humanity.

  • Stunning Visuals and Sound: Experience the vibrant, apocalypse-touched world brought to life with hand-drawn and AI-assisted artwork set against a backdrop of gritty Hip-Hop/Drill/Afro beats.

  • Challenging Gameplay: Engage in relentless enemy encounters and dynamic boss battles that ramp up in difficulty, challenging even the most skilled players.


Combat Mechanics:

Combo System: Players can seamlessly execute a series of powerful melee and ranged attacks. Every button press matters, with the game allowing for fluid transitions between moves, creating endless possibilities for breathtaking combo chains. Attacks are enhanced by an intricate meter system that allows the player to utilize more effective combos both stationary and air and unleash devastating combos and special attacks.

Weapon System: Choose from a diverse arsenal. Melee weapons like swords and spears offer close-quarters combat, while secondary projectile weapons allow for strategic long-range attacks. Weapon choices affect both the visual and tactical aspects of combat.

Visual and Audio Presentation:

Art Style: The game features a unique blend of hand-drawn graphics and AI-assisted art, creating a visually stunning, yet bleak depiction of a futuristic post-apocalyptic Lagos. Each frame is crafted to reflect the high stakes and intensity of Chimere’s journey.

Soundtrack and Voice Acting: Driven by a hiphop/afrobeat soundtrack, the game maintains an energetic pace complemented by laid-back beats. Professional voice acting adds depth to the characters, enhancing the immersive experience.


Levels and Enemies:

Navigate through diverse environments from ruined cityscapes to alien strongholds. Each level introduces new challenges and enemy types, requiring players to adapt their tactics. Boss fights are elaborate and challenging the player to change their tactics, often requiring players to exploit specific weaknesses and test their mastery of the game’s combat system.

Challenge and Replayability:

With an advanced difficulty curve that respects player progression, "Obsidian Eclipse: Azure Enforcer" offers a satisfying challenge that invites mastery. Dive into the narrative rich camapign, paratake in challenges and unlock unique episodes.

content_descriptors.notes:
There are potentially uneasy discussions about war, PTSD, traumatic experiences or other related subjects or topics. Graphic depictions of corpses (no mutilation), depictions of Alcohol and or substance abuse. The use of profanity is within some dialog of the game. 

Contains no sexual acts or sexual violence/harm against any specific gender, or sexually profane language.
